TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IServiceBehavior
public ref class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IServiceBehavior
type AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IServiceBehavior

Docs.summary: Applied to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service to indicate whether that service can be run in ASP.NET compatibility code.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在应用于服务实现类时，此属性可指示该服务是否需要 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容模式，或是否支持为宿主应用程序域 (AppDomain) 启用该兼容模式。
承载 WCF 服务的应用程序域可以在两个不同的宿主模式下运行：
- 混合传输模式 （默认值）： 在此模式下，WCF 服务不参与[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]HTTP 管道。 这可保证 WCF 服务行为的一致性，独立于宿主环境和传输。
- [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容性模式： 在此模式下，WCF 服务参与[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]HTTP 管道的方式与 ASMX 服务类似。 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 文件授权、 url 授权和 HTTP 会话状态等功能都适用于在此模式下运行的 WCF 服务。
宿主模式由应用程序级配置标记 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` 控制。
`<system.serviceModel>`
`<serviceHostingEnvironment aspNetCompatibilityEnabled="true"/>`
`</system.serviceModel>`
此标志是`false`默认情况下和因此 WCF 服务运行在混合传输模式下除非你显式选择加入[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]兼容性模式。
有关 ASP.NET 兼容模式的详细信息，请参阅[ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)。
使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> 属性可以实现此目的。 运行时，应用程序可以通过检查静态属性 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 的值，来检测是否启用了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.AspNetCompatibilityEnabled%2A> 兼容模式。
## Examples 服务开发人员可以确保其服务仅运行在 ASP.NET 兼容模式下通过设置<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A>属性<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute>到<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode.Required>下面的示例中所示
[!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)]
[!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode RequirementsMode { System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the level of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility required by the service.
Docs.value: ，该值指示服务所需的度 [！INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容性。 默认值为 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> 属性可以在代码中设置宿主模式。 还可以通过设置应用程序级配置标记 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` 来完成此操作。 有关详细信息，请参阅[ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)。
运行时，应用程序可以通过检查静态属性 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 的值，来检测是否启用了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.AspNetCompatibilityEnabled%2A> 兼容模式。
## Examples [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

Docs.summary: Checks that the type of hosting is consistent with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持 WCF 基础结构，不宜在代码中直接使用。

Docs.exception: The service hosting is not compatible with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.
